title: Target: Klopp wants to base Liverpool attack around Andre Ayew
text:
Sports News | 11 October 2015 09:10 CET Target: Klopp wants to base Liverpool attack around Andre Ayew - www.allsports.com.gh 
Ghanaian player Andre Ayew is a top transfer target for new Liverpool boss Jurgen Klopp who is a few days into his job at the Anfield club. 
ESPN FC sources indicate that the Black Stars vice-captain who transferred from Olympique Marseille to Swansea City in the summer transfer window is the man Jurgen Klopp wants to build his Liverpool attack around. 
The Ghana international has taken the Premier League by storm with brilliant performances since arriving at the Welsh club scoring four goals in his opening eight games. 
Andre Ayew was twice targeted by German coach Jurgen Klopp during his time in the German Bundesliga with Borussia Dortmund. 
The Liverpool boss is expected to make an early offer to sign Ayew in January. 
Jurgen Klopp is also seeking to reunite with striker Robert Lewandowski who plays for German Champions Bayern Munich. Follow @kboakye92
